metadata.title: CVE-2016-20011 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: libgrss through 0.7.0 fails to perform TLS certificate verification whendownloading feeds, allowing remote attackers to manipulate the contents offeeds without detection. This occurs because of the default behavior ofSoupSessionSync.

criterions.comment: libgrss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
